# Interactive Math Learning Website for Kids

## Project Overview
An engaging, interactive math learning website designed for a 6-year-old with Anki-style flashcards, timer system, and reward collection mechanics.

## Key Features
- Timer-based math card challenges
- Reward collection system with gift cards
- Admin panel for card management
- Colorful, animated kid-friendly interface
- Zero maintenance hosting on free platforms

## Technology Stack
- Next.js with React
- Tailwind CSS for styling
- Framer Motion for animations
- JSON-based data storage
- Static site generation for free hosting

## Development Guidelines
- Prioritize visual appeal and smooth animations
- Ensure all components are responsive and accessible
- Focus on engaging user interactions for young children
- Maintain simple admin interface for easy content management
